title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc outjar to create a JAR file, the resulting file does not contain the expected MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: Currently, when using ajc outjar, the resulting JAR file does not include the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside.
EB: The expected behavior is that when using ajc outjar, the resulting JAR file should include the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside, making it a valid JAR file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Use ajc outjar to create a JAR file
2. Inspect the contents of the generated JAR file
3. Verify that the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file is not present within the JAR file
